name: COMP9601 Theory Of Computation And Algorithms Design 2015
body:
### Course Schedule


|Week|         Details        |
|----|:----------------------:|
|  1 |    Finite Automata     |
|  2 |   Regular Expression   |
|  3 |       PDA Grammar      |
|  4 |           CFL          |
|  5 |     Turing Machines    |
|  6 | Random Access Machines |
|  7 |        Reduction       |
|  8 |     Time Complexity    |
|  9 |  NP-Complete Problems  |
| 10 |    Space Complexity    |
| 11 |      Suffix Trees      |
| 12 |      Suffix Arrays     |
| 13 |           BWT          |
| 14 |    Online Algorithms   |
| 15 |    Online Scheduling   |


### Course Materials

Course PPT
- [L01 finite automata](./COMP9601/L01%20finite%20automata.pdf)
- [L02 regular expression](./COMP9601/L02%20regular%20expression.pdf)
- [L03 pda grammar](./COMP9601/L03%20pda%20%20grammar.ppt.pdf)
- [L04 cfl](./COMP9601/L04%20cfl.pdf)
- [L05 Turing machines](./COMP9601/L05%20Turing%20machines.pdf)
- [L06 random access machines](./COMP9601/L06%20random%20access%20machines.pdf)
- [L07 Reduction](./COMP9601/L07%20Reduction.ppt.pdf)
- [L08 Time complexity](./COMP9601/L08%20Time%20complexity.ppt.pdf)
- [L9 NP-Complete problems](./COMP9601/L9%20NP-Complete%20problems.pdf)
- [L10 Space complexity](./COMP9601/L10%20Space%20complexity.pdf)
- [L11 Suffix Trees](./COMP9601/L11%20Suffix_Trees.pdf)
- [L12 suffix arrays](./COMP9601/L12%20suffix arrays.pdf)
- [L13 BWT](./COMP9601/L13%20Online%20algorithms.ppt.pdf)
- [L14 Online algorithms](./COMP9601/L14%20BWT.ppt.pdf)
- [L15 online scheduling](./COMP9601/L15%20online%20scheduling.pdf)


### Supplementary Material

- [Lecture Notes for Online Algorithms (Stanford CS369), Plotkin, 2012](./COMP9601/cs369-notes.pdf)
- [Compressed full-text indexes, Navarro and Makinen, ACM Computing Survey, 2007]( http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1216372)
- Algorithms on strings, trees, and sequences, Gusfield, 1997, Cambridge.
